original_text: “And you, Ezra, according to the wisdom of your God that is in your hand, appoint magistrates and judges who may judge all the people in the province Beyond the River, all such as know the laws of your God. And those who do not know them, you shall teach.
korean_text: 에스라여 너는 네 손에 있는 네 하나님의 지혜를 따라 네 하나님의 율법을 아는 자를 법관과 재판관을 삼아 강 건너편 모든 백성을 재판하게 하고 그 중 알지 못하는 자는 너희가 가르치라

sentences.original_text: according to the wisdom of your God
who may judge all the people
in the province Beyond the River,
all such as know the laws of your God.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 하나님의 율법을 아는 모든 자들

sentences.original_text: And those who do not know them,
